channel.title: Dazzle Dvc and Sony Vegas
channel.description: Well, I got sony vegas 9 and a dazzle Dvc recorder. But whenever I try to make it record in vegas it says "The device 'dazzle dvc100 video devcie' could not be opened. Please make sure that it is turned on and is not being used by another application or user" Restart computer, and try it again. So its not being used by another application. It also works in windows movie maker but has a shit quality.

item.title: Dazzle Dvc and Sony Vegas
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Lil Goon, post:6, topic:277441”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=366322.msg2777695#msg2777695 date=1241622158]

you don’t record it in Vegas…you must record it within the program it gives you…
[/quote]No, the program It gave me, was used to record for a dvd. So i’d have to get a converter. Plus it lets me record it in movie maker, virtual dub, and a few others.

Pinnacle lets you record straight for editing rather than dvd you cock.

Ok, There is the newer version of the Dazzle and Older Version. The older version game with pinnacle studio, mine didn’t. It came with a disk of drivers and thats it. Dick.

[quote author=goatee link=topic=366322.msg2777795#msg2777795 date=1241626464]
What are you recording? Your xbox/ps3/wii or your TV?
[/quote]Xbox.[/quote]
It does come with pinaccle studio dumb fuck. I have the latest version. Install the instant DVD recorder, and all that shit.

Read full topic

Get EzCap 116vb. The DC60+ model.
